Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_n3w5n43hQw1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/gE5KQ7PqO9k" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p>We posted about this earlier on Facebook and Twitter, but <span>Space_Scumbag</span> was kind enough to upload the full video of one of the weirdest, most innovative builds we’ve ever seen. That leaves us with the question - will it blend?</p>

Yes! I just saw this and thought "NEEDS TO BE IN WENSDAYS WEEKLY"

Also, who is Space_Scumbag? This was uploaded by SWDennis, creator of SPACE FROGS
You are an EVIL GENIUS. That was soo funny. Did expect to see Kerbals and fuel drums in there at the same time though. 3 thumbs up.
Hey, that's my work. I didn't expect to be featured in The Daily Kerbal. And yes, my youtube name is SWDennis, Space_Scumbag is for Reddit and the KSP forum.
May the Kraken dunk you in monopropellant before devouring. Nonetheless, it was both very creative and hilarious

Hey, that's my work. I didn't expect to be featured in The Daily Kerbal. And yes, my youtube name is SWDennis, Space_Scumbag is for Reddit and the KSP forum.

Oh. I didn't know that. Sorry.
